about_the_game:
"Duck Dash" is a top-down arena shooter roguelite game. Players take on the role of a little duck and embark on a journey of growth, strategically selecting optimal skill combinations to become a mighty warrior.

Features

  • Currently features the two characters, the Shooting Duck and the Fighter Duck.
  • The Duck undergoes evolution every 5 level-ups.
  • Choose different attribute enhancements during character leveling, and select a unique golden skill during each evolution.
  • Choose from dozens of different golden skills. For example: Ghost, Flame Arrow, Blade Rain, Companions, Magic Sword, Bloodthirsty, Cursed Ring...
  • Collect experience points to level up by defeating more enemies and obtaining experience gems.

"Duck Dash" is a top-down arena shooter roguelite game. Players take on the role of a little duck and embark on a journey of growth, strategically selecting optimal skill combinations to become a mighty warrior.

Features

  • Currently features the two characters, the Shooting Duck and the Fighter Duck.
  • The Duck undergoes evolution every 5 level-ups.
  • Choose different attribute enhancements during character leveling, and select a unique golden skill during each evolution.
  • Choose from dozens of different golden skills. For example: Ghost, Flame Arrow, Blade Rain, Companions, Magic Sword, Bloodthirsty, Cursed Ring...
  • Collect experience points to level up by defeating more enemies and obtaining experience gems.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16+
  • Processor: Inter I3-2100 / AMD A8-5600ki
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.1
  • Processor: Inter I3-2100 / AMD A8-5600ki
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
